-- | Tree with Meta and Content parameters
--   
--   This Haskell library provides an implementation of a tree data type
--   with meta data in the nodes and contents in the leaves.
@package mtree
@version 0.1


-- | This Haskell library provides an implementation of a tree data type
--   with meta data in the nodes and content in the leaves.
module Data.Trees.MTree

-- | | The <tt>Tree m c</tt> is a tree structure with metadata in the nodes
--   | and metadata and content in the leaves.
data Tree m c
Leaf :: m -> c -> Tree m c
meta :: Tree m c -> m
content :: Tree m c -> c
Node :: m -> [Tree m c] -> Tree m c
meta :: Tree m c -> m
trees :: Tree m c -> [Tree m c]
instance (Show m, Show c) => Show (Tree m c)
instance (Eq m, Eq c) => Eq (Tree m c)
instance Bitraversable Tree
instance Bifoldable Tree
instance Bifunctor Tree
